title: Hollywood Biblical Epics: Camp Spectacle and Queer Style from the Silent Era to the Modern Day
description: This is the only book of its kind to explore biblical epics from an LGBT perspective, studying films from the silent era, to the postwar major studio era, to the present day. It considers pre-code films, production code films, and films under the modern MPAA ratings system, and explores the relationship between biblical content and camp.
author: Richard A. Lindsay
